368060.name: D4: SWERY's Choice Costume Set -4 Cups of Coffee-
368060.description:
An additional character costume pack hand-picked by D4's director, SWERY!

Café SWERY65 Hoodie
Sebastian the Sleuth T-Shirt
"Making My Point" T-Shirt
#65 Hockey Jersey

Use this pack to further enjoy the world of D4!

※ Once downloaded, this content will be added to the base game.
※ This content is not included in the Deluxe Edition
368060.supported_languages:
英语*, 法语, 意大利语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 日语, 葡萄牙语 - 葡萄牙
*具有完全音频支持的语言
